TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted, you are attacked by an angry mob in real life.

I wish for a cupcakes
Granted, you get delicious cupcake, they are to die for... (What do you was expecting? )

Granted, you are turned into one of those cupcakes.

I wish there were less MLP gore fanfics.

Granted, now they're all clopping fanfics

I wish I could find other talking subjects

(Sometime, I feel like the one who ingnit some pony wild fire on this forum)

(Do it was like this before I came here?)

Edited October 25, 2013 by mrrpamplemousse

(I was kinda like the gasoline in it...)

Granted.... We don't (hey, Pample and Ace, why don't we try and corrupt eachother's pony wishes via PMing so there is a flavor in here)

I wish that you 2 would accept the above request

Nah! I actually wish for me to be able to make a funny YTP

Okay... Granted, its really funny, but it never gains a lot of popularity.

I wish we just skipped the space shuttle and went to mars or colonized the moon.

Granted, it's a one-way trip to mars

(Just get a great YTP, there is a 2sec awdward MLP scene, but it's great! Link)

I wish for a warp drive

Edited October 25, 2013 by mrrpamplemousse

Granted.

But it required so much energy that you can't use it with today technology.

I wish I could have that technology and the warp drive.

Granted, you sell everything you own for them.

I wi... I wish. I w... *collapses and passes out*

Granted you are now dead.

I wish to make a portal to go to any Universe.

Granted, you go through a one-way portal to Android Hell. and you can't go anywhere else

I... wish... to... attend a nancho party (spelling error intentional)

Granted. You die of drug overdose.

I wish for chinchillas.

Granded, they have a deadly desease that can contanimate humain

I wish that phoenix existed IRL

Granted, 2 Phoenixes appear, one sets everything on fire, the other screams OBJECTION!

I wish I could add anything I wanted to TF2 from the workshop (excluding weapons)

Granted, they're all neither tradable, giftable, nor usable in crafting

I wish I can- *gets injected with drank and DIES from drunkness*

Granted, you get re-incarnated as a slug. That's for making my items Non tradeable, giftable and Uncraftable

I wish less people were derp scouts.

Granted, they're now derpy's clones

I wish that my cat wasn't fat

I wouldn't mind Derpy's clones for the record...

Granted, It's so skinny it's ugly

I wish that the blue team would stop losing in War thunder.

granted, but now nobody wins.

I wish that people would stop wishing for the same subject and stop grudging.

erm, I wasn't wishing for Ponies then... I was wishing for less derp scouts

Granted, that's what's now

I wish that Dota 1 was still popular

Granted, Overload of hacker

I wish I could do good artwork (maybe you already seen my Space Kraken)

Okay, but you become blind

I wish Bronies didn't exist.

(i want to see this corrupted)

Granted, Internet stability is compromised and furries take over the world

I wish that there's was a clear rule of the internet refference
oh shiet I got sniped, Ignore

double ninja'd

granted but then all the bronies leave the forums.

I wish that people understood what I was saying.
